attributes.action: bring in legislation to force M.P's, who have used their expenses for financial gain to leave Parliament immediately. This would stop them from staying on in Parliament until it is disolved, thereby obtaining further financial gain at the cost of the Taxpayer.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cheats should not be rewarded. Any person in a normal job, who is caught making false or inflated expenses would lose their job and may be prosecuted. M.P's should not be treated as special cases. This should also apply to Ministers. To say it was an oversight or mistake is not accepted by the Inland Revenue and it is no excuse here.

rejection.details: Government does not control who sits in Parliament. This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/ or the relevant political party(ies).
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
